title: Your report's system is disgusting, Riot
body: You're literally the worst server and worst system I've ever seen and played. Have you ever seen what happened in games or you just set your system to ban a user's account automatically? Fucking terrible system, fuck you Riot

replies.body: It is just taking the piss. I am taking an extended break rn . If they made an option to disable chat and abandoned BE id come back in a flash.
You can just drag the chat off the screen/unbind your enter key

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=l2YjI07K,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-12T08:35:46.637+0000)
>
> You can just drag the chat off the screen/unbind your enter key

yeah gonna deffo do that when I reinstall. Haven't played since early october - but still very interested in the direction riot is taking league.

How to never get punished - NEVER TALK. Literally the only way. Having a human reaction to a negative situation? Nah, you deserve to be punished because you got frustrated with people wasting 20mins of your life and making you lose the game. This system heavily favors the trolls and heavily punishes the victims of trolling if they do the unthinkable respond to it oh no!

Yes, it is automated hence why it's trash. Biggest online game in the world and yet they can't afford to hire people to look into reports personally to see the full picture or god forbid even people volunteering to look at reports.
Judging by this post, u sound like u deserve to be banned {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

>Have you ever seen what happened in games or you just set your system to ban a user's account automatically?

Oh it's all automated, don't get anything wrong in thinking anything but that.

There is a list of no-no words that will get you auto banned (for 14 days) otherwise you rarely see a ban.
